languages.text: "Они в городе. Мой дорогой предок следит за проведением торжеств для народа, а прочая родня надзирает за самыми важными городскими службами. Мы не хотим, чтобы какой-то сбой омрачил этот славный день".

traits.locale_text: "Они в городе. Мой дорогой предок следит за проведением торжеств для народа, а прочая родня надзирает за самыми важными городскими службами. Мы не хотим, чтобы какой-то сбой омрачил этот славный день".

languages.text: "They are in the city. My dear forebear is watching over the festivities being organised for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We do not want some mishap to darken this glorious day."
languages.original_text: "Они в городе. Мой дорогой предок следит за проведением торжеств для народа, а прочая родня надзирает за самыми важными городскими службами. Мы не хотим, чтобы какой-то сбой омрачил этот славный день".

traits.locale_text: "They are in the city. My dear ancestor is watching over the festivities being organized for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We wouldn't want for some mishap to darken this glorious day."

"They are in the city. My dear ancestor is watching over the festivities being organized for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We wouldn't want for some mishap to darken this glorious day."

"They are in the city. My dear forebear is watching over the festivities being organised for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We do not want some mishap to darken this glorious day."

"They are in the city. My dear forebear is watching over the festivities being organised for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We do not want some mishap to darken this glorious day."

"They are in the city. My dear forebear is watching over the festivities being organised for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We do not want some mishap to darken this glorious day."

languages.text: 「街にいます。敬愛する祖先は人民のために開催されている祭りの警備に当たっており、一族の他の者は最重要の警備に当たっております。不運な出来事で今日という輝かしい日の光を消すわけにはいきません」
languages.original_text: "They are in the city. My dear forebear is watching over the festivities being organised for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We do not want some mishap to darken this glorious day."

traits.locale_text: 「街にいます。敬愛する祖先は人民のために開催されている祭りの警備に当たっており、一族の他の者は最重要の警備に当たっております。不運な出来事で今日という輝かしい日の光を消すわけにはいきません」

languages.text: “他们都在城里。我亲爱的曾祖正在监督为人民举办的庆典活动，而我的其他亲族则负责监督重要的仪式。我们可不希望如此荣耀的日子里发生什么意外。”
languages.original_text: "They are in the city. My dear forebear is watching over the festivities being organised for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We do not want some mishap to darken this glorious day."

traits.locale_text: “他们都在城里。我亲爱的曾祖正在监督为人民举办的庆典活动，而我的其他亲族则负责监督重要的仪式。我们可不希望如此荣耀的日子里发生什么意外。”

languages.text: «Están en la ciudad. Mi querido ancestro está supervisando la organización de los festejos para la población mientras que el resto de mis parientes organiza los servicios esenciales. No queremos que algún accidente eche a perder este día tan glorioso».
languages.original_text: "They are in the city. My dear forebear is watching over the festivities being organised for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We do not want some mishap to darken this glorious day."

traits.locale_text: «Están en la ciudad. Mi querido ancestro está supervisando la organización de los festejos para la población mientras que el resto de mis parientes organiza los servicios esenciales. No queremos que algún accidente eche a perder este día tan glorioso».

languages.text: « Ils sont en ville. Mon cher aïeul veille au bon déroulement des festivités organisées pour le peuple, tandis que les autres supervisent les services essentiels. Nous ne permettrons à aucun incident de venir perturber cette glorieuse journée. »
languages.original_text: "They are in the city. My dear forebear is watching over the festivities being organised for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We do not want some mishap to darken this glorious day."

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont en ville. Mon cher aïeul veille au bon déroulement des festivités organisées pour le peuple, tandis que les autres supervisent les services essentiels. Nous ne permettrons à aucun incident de venir perturber cette glorieuse journée. »

languages.text: "In der Stadt. Mein werter Urgroßvater überwacht die für das Volk organisierten Festivitäten, und meine übrige Verwandtschaft kümmert sich um die wichtigsten Veranstaltungen. Wir wollen nicht, dass irgendein Unglück diesen glorreichen Tag eintrübt."
languages.original_text: "They are in the city. My dear forebear is watching over the festivities being organised for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We do not want some mishap to darken this glorious day."

traits.locale_text: "In der Stadt. Mein werter Urgroßvater überwacht die für das Volk organisierten Festivitäten, und meine übrige Verwandtschaft kümmert sich um die wichtigsten Veranstaltungen. Wir wollen nicht, dass irgendein Unglück diesen glorreichen Tag eintrübt."

languages.text: "Hepsi şehirde. Canım atam, halk için düzenlenen kutlamaları idare ederken diğer akrabalarım da en kritik hizmetleri denetliyor. Bu şanlı güne bir terslikle leke sürülmesini istemiyoruz."
languages.original_text: "They are in the city. My dear forebear is watching over the festivities being organised for the people, and the rest of my kin are overseeing the most important services. We do not want some mishap to darken this glorious day."

traits.locale_text: "Hepsi şehirde. Canım dedem, halk için düzenlenen kutlamaları idare ederken, diğer akrabalarım da en kritik hizmetleri denetliyor. Bu şanlı güne bir terslikle leke sürülmesini istemeyiz."
